name: Temporal Worlds
description:
NOTE: Do not open the Instructions menu when the game is paused. There is a bug that needs resolving. To see the instructions, go to the Main Menu.

Temporal Worlds is a third person adventure game. Unfortunately, you might encounter a few bugs & the combat system is not polished yet. But even then, it is very fun & challenging to play. Make sure to read the instructions before playing. Good Luck!

Summary:

You are in a strange dimension consisting of 4 different worlds with a sun dial in between. A temporal Orb governs these worlds and it changes into a different mode every 10 seconds.
Each world has it's own dangers & secrets. Certain orb-modes might make a world very dangerous while others might bring out the tyranny.
To win the game, you need to find and beat 3 Time Titans in 3 different worlds & gather the temporal elements from each of them. Armed with the elements, return to the sun dial through the central portals and interact with the pedestal to finish the game.
Keep in mind that once you start the game & use a portal to enter a world, you won't be able to return back to the central sun dial until you have all the time elements & you can only travel between the 4 worlds using portals.

Made By:
Gustavo Sanchez
Yash Agrawal
Badr "Ghostie" Wael
Bruno Szwajcowski
